item.title: Using the phl_geocode Ruby Gem
item.description: I recently released phl_geocode, a simple Ruby gem which gets latitude and longitude coordinates for a Philadelphia address. Getting Started Install phl_geocode: gem install phl_geocode Require phl_geocode: require "phl_geocode" Instantiate a PHLGeocode instance: phl = PHLGeocode.new Get latitude/longitude coordinates for a Philadelphia address: phl.get_coordinates "1500 market street" Example response: [{ :address => "1500 MARKET ST", :similarity => 100, :latitude => 39.
